column2: The Mandala System is a way to organize a state as a circle, or mandala in sanskrit, around a center of power. Leader of Mandala realms acknowledged that they can no longer hope to effectively govern the realms after the pre-event infrastructure have decayed beyond repair, instead they seek to empower their powerbase by waging war for prestige and tribute or giving alms to monk and holy men for piety and political clouts.
